title: I'm just not having fun anymore.
body:
And I can't even really tell you why. I used to get all happy when I pulled off stupid stuff, and I'd get excited for new champs, but now I just... don't care. I don't know if it's the gameplay, or the balance issues, or matching, but I just don't have fun anymore -- and this isn't just League, I'm having trouble enjoying myself in any game.

Maybe I'm just jaded, since newer games are kind of shitty. Or maybe my depression is just getting worse. But I'm having a hard time enjoying anything anymore.

I'm looking forward to Maplestory 2, since it's silly and light hearted, but are there any other games that are just... fun? Even if they're not good or popular.
